ref.mixed-citation:
Gu CJ
Borjabad A
Hadas E
EcoHIV infection of mice establishes latent viral reservoirs in T cells and active viral reservoirs in macrophages that are sufficient for induction of neurocognitive impairment. PLoS Pathog 2018; 14: e1007061. 29879225

note.p: This study demonstrates that EcoHIV infection in mice induces HIV-specific cognitive impairment that may be prevented by antiretroviral therapy.
